abstract: Jazz singer Kurt Elling and his family love their two-bedroom rental apartment on the Upper West Side, with charming prewar touches, abundant closet space and plenty of wall space for their contemporary art collection.
lead_paragraph: When he’s not on the road promoting his music, the baritone jazz singer lives with his family on the Upper West Side.

headline.main: Where Nice Evenings Are Recalled by Kurt Elling

snippet: When he’s not on the road promoting his music, the baritone jazz singer lives with his family on the Upper West Side.
